name: PowerUp Elevation
description:
PowerUp Elevation is an 'autorun' platform game set in a world full of crushing elevators and deadly traps. Avoid spikes, use gravity flip, pick up powerups and time your jumps well in increasingly challenging stages in order to steal a kiss from your mate before the time runs out.


Features :
  • Slower or faster gameplay mode.
  • Two difficult settings/ two endings.
  • 6 worlds, each world contains 8 levels + 1 practice level.
  • You will be killed a LOT, so unlimited lives are enabled (but show time used).
  • The game can been played a bit slower than normal.


Screen Resolutions supported:
  • This game was designed as a windowered game in a 16:10 format using the game native 1280x812 resolution.
  • Scaling and fullscreen is supported by any format (Alt/Enter to switch).
  • If played on fullscreen 16:9 mode, the whole screen is used without any borders.
